short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Wonderful 89.5 KBAQ Classical Music right from your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the Unofficial "KBAQ Player" for 89.5 FM KBAQ Radio, "K Bach" is a Phoenix metro area FM radio station that plays classical music twenty-four hours per day. The broadcast schedule consists primarily of playlists announced by local hosts, as well as a few nationally syndicated broadcasts from NPR and American Public Media.
